title: Sign-in Marvel - Novel Updates
tags: Accelerated Growth   Alternate World   Based on a Movie   Character Growth   Cheats   Fanfiction   Game Elements   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Overpowered Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Romantic Subplot   Weak to Strong   World Hopping
author: Fānqié Jiān Xīhóngshì   番茄煎西红柿
description:
Sign-in to get T-Virus, sign-in to get Haki, sign-in to get magic, sign-in to get ninjutsu.

This was a story of a Hao Yun who use the sign-in system to sign-in, step by step from ordinary people to superheroes!

“Thanos get ready I’ll sign-in to defeat you!!”>
